name: Blight
description: No one has heard from Tam Elbrun or spotted Gomtuu in years, but when the living ship known as "Tin Man" attacks a starbase, suddenly the pair are on everyone's radar. Confront the duo before anyone else comes to harm.
rules:
-- In a Skirmish Event, you will engage in space battles against thematically appropriate foes until the Event's conclusion.
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- Unique Ship Battle Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using DeSoto, MacDougal, Elbrun, Infected Tryla Scott, Astrophysicists or crew with matching Battle Traits, will provide a bonus.
-- Using Gomtuu, the U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701-D, or the Suurok Class Combat Cruiser will provide a bonus to hull.
-- Every Ship Battle you win earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: DeSoto, MacDougal, Elbrun, Infected Tryla Scott, or Astrophysicists

featured_crew.name: Spock
featured_crew.flavor: Spock begins his tenure on the Enterprise under the command of Captain Pike.

featured_crew.name: MacDougal
featured_crew.flavor: Lt. MacDougal rushes to restore control of the ship after the Polywater Virus wreaks havoc on its crew.

featured_crew.name: Elbrun
featured_crew.flavor: He was called for a first contact mission in 2366 when an alien intelligence of an organic starship, codenamed 'Tin Man', was discovered.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Picard
rewards.flavor: Captain of the legendary U.S.S. Enterprise-D, Captain Picard was key to many of the Federation's successes.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Suurok Class Combat Cruiser Ship Schematic
rewards.full_name: Suurok Class Combat Cruiser Ship Schematic

ship.name: Suurok Class Combat Cruiser
ship.flavor: Used as both a Combat Cruiser or a Science Vessel, the Suurok Class was among the fastest and most powerful starships operating in the Vulcan fleet.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

next_threshold_rewards.name: Credits
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

screens.text: "Captain, afraid I have some urgent orders for you. Gomtuu, the living ship known as the 'Tin Man', has reappeared with a bang. It attacked and destroyed much of Starbase 42. The vessel was unresponsive to any attempts at communication."
"The same goes for its last known inhabitant, Tam Elbrun. We've even tried to enlist the help of several Betazoids, but to no avail. This is nothing like the docile pair that left us."

"We need you to find them. I realize there are many who are worried about the ship and her occupant, but we can't risk another Starbase 42. Bring them in alive if you can. But do what you have to for the greater good."

"Captain, afraid I have some urgent orders for you. Gomtuu, the living ship known as the 'Tin Man', has reappeared with a bang. It attacked and destroyed much of Starbase 42. The vessel was unresponsive to any attempts at communication."
"The same goes for its last known inhabitant, Tam Elbrun. We've even tried to enlist the help of several Betazoids, but to no avail. This is nothing like the docile pair that left us."

"We need you to find them. I realize there are many who are worried about the ship and her occupant, but we can't risk another Starbase 42. Bring them in alive if you can. But do what you have to for the greater good."

responses.text: "Why did you two attack a starbase?"
"Where have you two been all this time?"

screens.text: "They tried to get inside my head...he tries to protect me...even now...but can't...last much longer..."

"I think it's clear that Tam at least is in distress. But sensors indicate they're gearing up for another attack. Captain, I'm afraid you'll have to engage them once more. If you can, subdue them and bring them home."

responses.text: "Why did you two attack a starbase?"
"Where have you two been all this time?"

screens.text: "They tried to get inside my head...he tries to protect me...even now...but can't...last much longer..."

"I think it's clear that Tam at least is in distress. But sensors indicate they're gearing up for another attack. Captain, I'm afraid you'll have to engage them once more. If you can, subdue them and bring them home."
